title: Is this a joke ?
body: I've got stable internet connection but I get login and game launching errors and I get leave busters because of that . It happened again

replies.body: Make tittles relevent to the topic so people know what it is...

I'd like to help but need more information to determine what's causing you to leave games.  For example, what exactly do you mean by game launching errors?  What error messages are you getting?  Your connection might also appear stable, but doesn't make you immune from having issues reaching specific services like the game server.  We can't remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) but happy to help troubleshoot to prevent further leaves.  Let me know.
